ActivateCSSEditor_doc: Set it to 'true' in order to enable OmniCode CSS editor for .css files and <style> tags
AutoCollapseTIS_doc: Whenever you open a file containing TIScript, choose wheter you want function blocks to shown automatically collapsed/outlined: 'never', 'functions', 'functions_or_closures', 'inner_functions', 'inner_functions_or_closures'
